inclusion.criterion: diagnosed with type 1 diabetes for ≥3 months
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: being treated with insulin injections in the form of multiple daily injections or through insulin infusion pump
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: male or non-pregnant and non-lactating female, at least 6 weeks postpartum prior to screening visit
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: history of blood-born chronic viral infection (e.g. Hepatitis C and HIV)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has type 1 diabetes confirmed with molecular analysis 7 years ago, is being treated with insulin injections, and meets the age criteria.
